title: Design Matters from the Archive: Cindy Gallop
description: Debbie talks to Cindy Gallop about her career in advertising and about the trouble people have communicating about sex. “People therefore find it bizarrely difficult to talk about sex with the people they’re having it with while they are actually having it.”
itunes:subtitle: Debbie talks to Cindy Gallop about her career in advertising and about   the trouble people have communicating about sex. “People therefore find   it bizarrely difficult to talk about sex with the people they’re having   it with while they are actually having it.”
author: podcasts@ted.com (Design Matters Media)
